oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Portrait of Horace Maynard, East Tennessee Unionist, painted by Lloyd Branson
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Lloyd Branson oil portrait of Horace Maynard (1813-1882), a prominent Tennessee Unionist during the Civil War. Branson was from Union County, Tenn. It is unknown whether the painting is from life or from a photograph. The painting was presented to the town of Maynardville, Union County, on October 4, 1909.
